remarks: Define the function relation map.  The definition is designed so that if ` R ` is a binary relation, then ` oF R ` is the analogous relation on functions which is true when each element of the left function relates to the corresponding element of the right function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
